oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of Confederate John P. Prescott
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1/9 plate tintype of John P. Prescott, Private, Company C "The Memphis Battalion," 3rd TN Infantry. Prescott wears a gray single breasted frock coat over a darker gray or blue vest with knee high cavalry boots and holds a slouch hat. The 1860 federal census lists John Prescott as the head of household along with his wife Elizabeth 28, and daughter Sarah, 2. His occupation was a farmer and $845 dollars was the total value of his estate.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Prescott, John P.
